metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In MuPDF 1.12.0 and earlier, multiple heap use after free bugs in the PDF parser could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code, read memory, or cause a denial of service via a crafted file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
